mapper.select:
select builtState, dataGranularityFirst, dataGranularitySecond, dataGranularityThird, siteNum, notVertRangeOne, notVertRangeTwo, notVertRangeThree, notVertRangeFour, notVertRangeFive, notVertRangeSix, notVertRangeSeven, notVertRangeEight, notVertRangeNine, notVertRangeTen, vertRangeOne, vertRangeTwo, vertRangeThree, vertRangeFour, vertRangeFive, vertRangeSix, vertRangeSeven, vertRangeEight, vertRangeNine, vertRangeTen from ( select built_state as builtState, '全国' as dataGranularityFirst, concat('1', '') as orderFirst, '' as dataGranularitySecond, '' as orderSecond, '' as dataGranularityThird, '' as orderThird, count(1) as siteNum, count(if(and(not and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), score >= 0, score < 10), 1, null)) as notVertRangeOne, count(if(and(not and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), score >= 10, score < 20), 1, null)) as notVertRangeTwo, count(if(and(not and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), score >= 20, score < 30), 1, null)) as notVertRangeThree, count(if(and(not and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), score >= 30, score < 40), 1, null)) as notVertRangeFour, count(if(and(not and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), score >= 40, score < 50), 1, null)) as notVertRangeFive, count(if(and(not and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), score >= 50, score < 60), notVertRangeNine, count(if(and(not and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), score >= 90, score <= 100), 1, null)) as notVertRangeTen, count(if(and(and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), score >= 0, score < 10), 1, null)) as vertRangeOne, count(if(and(and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), score >= 10, score < 20), 1, null)) as vertRangeTwo, count(if(and(and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), score >= 20, score < 30), 1, null)) as vertRangeThree, count(if(and(and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), score >= 30, score < 90), 1, null)) as vertRangeNine, count(if(and(and(isNotNull(vert_ind_dem), vert_ind_dem <> ''), score >= 90, score <= 100), 1, null)) as vertRangeTen from cmdi_pvopp.ads_indoor_weighted_score_for_annual_plan_info where event_id = #{params.raw.id} group by built_state union all select built_state as builtState, '全国' as dataGranularityFirst, concat('1', '') as orderFirst,
area_type area_type building_site_secondary_cover_scene building_site_secondary_cover_scene as dataGranularitySecond,
concat('1', area_type) concat('1', area_type) concat('1', building_site_secondary_cover_scene) concat('1', building_site_secondary_cover_scene) as orderSecond, '' as dataGranularityThird, '' as
